title: (x) MOGOLLON FONT ID - Gotham Extra Light {Tomi}
content:
Looking for a font ID on this thin sans serif used to spell MOGOLLON XV

many thanks in advance

danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100927050051im_/http:/typophile.com/files/81b4f7e816f91c60ba46bf4510598bab77b1ce93_m_5104.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [81b4f7e816f91c60ba46bf4510598bab77b1ce93\_m.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100927050051/http:/typophile.com/files/81b4f7e816f91c60ba46bf4510598bab77b1ce93_m.jpg) | 215.83 KB |
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: Looks a lot like Gotham Extra Light.
On a closer look, it seems like you're absolutely right, Tomi!

Darn. For a second I thought we were about to have a in-depth look at [Mongolian](http://web.archive.org/web/20100927050051/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mongolian_writing_systems) letterforms. It's a beautiful writing system.
